<< varislock Memory manager functions varunlock >>

varlock

Locks a variable.

Syntax

varlock(scope, variable_name)

Input argument

scope

a string: 'global', 'base', 'caller', 'local'.

variable_name

a string: variable name.

Description

varlock locks a variable.

Locked variables cannot be killed.

ans variable cannot be locked.

Example

y = 3;
varislock('local', 'y')
varlock('local', 'y')
varislock('local', 'y')
y = 4
varunlock('local', 'y')
varislock('local', 'y')
y = 4
varlock('local', 'ans')
varislock('local', 'ans')

See also

varislock, varunlock.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
